extends SourceTimeFunction
    Source time function estimation by stacked peaks.

    • コンストラクタの詳細

      • SourceTimeFunctionByStackedPeaks

        public SourceTimeFunctionByStackedPeaks(int np,
                                        double tlen,
                                        double samplingHz,
                                        SACData[] obsSacs,
                                        SACData[] synSacs,
                                        java.util.Set<TimewindowInformation> timewindow)
        パラメータ:
        np - the number of steps in frequency domain
        tlen - the time length
        samplingHz - must be 20 now
        obsSacs - same order as synSacs
        synSacs - same order as obsSacs
        timewindow - search region for Peaks

    • メソッドの詳細

      • getSourceTimeFunctionInFrequencyDomain

        public org.apache.commons.math3.complex.Complex[] getSourceTimeFunctionInFrequencyDomain()
        オーバーライド:
        getSourceTimeFunctionInFrequencyDomain クラス内 SourceTimeFunction
        戻り値:
        source time function in frequency domain. the length is SourceTimeFunction.np
